sentences.sContent: Local companies find the sites and build the theme parks, while we will look after the branding.
sentences.sCn: 本地公司选择场地及兴建主题公园，我们则负责品牌维护。

remMethod.val: brand(商标， 品牌) + ing(表行为) → 品牌命名

words.tran: 名牌商标的；打有烙印的；有斑纹的（等于brindled）
铭刻（brand的过去式和过去分词）
铭刻于，铭记；打烙印于；印…商标于

trans.tranOther: a practice that involves a company giving a group of their products the same brand name, helping this name to become well-known

trans.tranCn: 在…上加商标；使显得独一无二（brand的现在分词）
